sentences: stacked
flitting
leave
breathless
mound
shuffled
clamber
adventures
erosion

I stacked the toy blocks to make a tall tower.
The butterfly was flitting from flower to flower.
It is time to leave the playground and go home.
I was breathless after running to catch the bus.
We sat on the grassy mound and ate our lunch.
The tired puppy shuffled across the floor to its bed.
The cat clambered up the tree to chase the squirrel.
We had fun adventures exploring the forest trail.
The river causes erosion that shapes the soft sandbanks.
The choir sang in perfect harmony during the show.
korean: 나는 장난감 블록을 쌓아 높은 탑을 만들었어요.
버스를 잡으려고 달린 뒤 숨이 찼어요.
우리는 풀밭 둔덕에 앉아 점심을 먹었어요.
피곤한 강아지가 바닥을 발을 끌며 침대로 갔어요.
우리는 숲길을 탐험하며 재미있는 모험을 했어요.
강물은 부드러운 모래둑을 깎아내는 침식을 일으켜요.
